text:
Joanne Missingham (Chinese name: Hei Jiajia, 黒嘉嘉) is an Australian-born Taiwanese professional Go player.
Life.
She gained media attention in 2011 when she held up a fan with "protest gender discrimination" in professional tournaments. She protested because she learned that female Go players were not paid fairly.
